column8: Akihabara (秋葉原) also called Akiba after a former local shrine is a district in central Tokyo that is famous for its many electronics shops.

column6: St-Antoine St south to the St Lawrence River
column8: The current Imperial Palace (皇居 Kōkyo) is located on the former site of Edo Castle a large park area surrounded by moats and massive stone walls in the center of Tokyo.
Montmorency Falls Park attracts nature lovers and sightseers alike with its 272-foot waterfall.
